message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $14,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,000?
